tag_list: online-advertising, click-forensics, adometry, vistage, click-fraud, google, yahoo, microsoft
overview:
Tom Cuthbert is one of the leading industry voices in the battle against pay-per-click advertising fraud. He developed the Click Fraud Network, the first and largest service of its kind that advertisers use to monitor online advertising campaigns for click fraud. It’s also the first service to report accurate monthly and quarterly data on the overall industry-wide click fraud threat level.

Tom has spoken on the topics of pay-per-click advertising and click fraud at top industry events, including ad:tech and the Search Engine Strategies conference. He has also appeared as a click fraud industry expert on CNBC and Bloomberg television. Tom is frequently tapped by leading newspapers and magazines and his views on click fraud have appeared in the Wall Street Journal, BusinessWeek, Red Herring, Financial Times and Associated Press.

As a key member of the Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB) Click Measurement Working Group, Tom has worked with Google, Yahoo!, Microsoft and top advertisers to develop the industry’s first click fraud measurement standards. He also founded the Click Quality Council, which represents more than 100 leading advertisers who work together to provide advertiser input into the development of industry click quality measurement standards.

As founder and former president and CEO of Click Forensics (now Admoetry), Tom was responsible for all facets of operations, product development and marketing. He previously co-founded OPTIMAL iQ and led the growth of the firm as a recognized provider of web analytics services to Fortune 1000 companies. Tom was also involved in the retail and entertainment business, including serving ten years as a senior executive with a national restaurant chain.

Cuthbert stepped back as CEO and from day-to-day involvement in January of 2010 to pursue other business interests. He remains a member of the board of directors and active participant in the online advertising community.

Today Tom chairs a CEO group for Vistage International and serves on several boards. His focus is business growth and works to help people who run companies become much more effective while working fewer hours and improving their personal life.

Tom enjoys time with his family, traveling, exploring wine and reading.

milestones.description: Released industry Interactive Advertising Bureau click standards with Google and Yahoo

milestones.source_description: Click Forensics sniffs out $10M in venture funds

milestones.description: Announced industry changing partnership with Yahoo
milestones.source_description: Yahoo! Cozies Up To Its Click-Fraud Critics

milestones.description: Google announces alliance with Click Forensics
milestones.source_description: Google in Curious Alliance With Click-fraud Detection Firm
